documentation.text: @dev Reverts if the vesting schedule does not exist or has been revoked.

@dev Creates a vesting contract.
 @param dao_ address of the Bevor DAO that controls
@dev This function is called for plain Ether transfers, i.e. for every call with empty calldata.

@dev Fallback function is executed if none of the other functions match the function
 identifier or no data was provided with the function call.

@notice Revokes the vesting schedule for given identifier.
 @param vestingScheduleId the vesting schedule identifier

documentation.text:
@notice Release vested amount of tokens.
 @param vestingScheduleId the vesting schedule identifier

@dev Returns the number of vesting schedules associated to a beneficiary.
 @return the number of vesting schedules

 @return the vesting id

@notice Returns the vesting schedule information for a given holder and index.
 @return the vesting schedule structure information

@dev Returns the number of vesting schedules managed by this contract.
 @return the number of vesting schedules

@notice Computes the vested amount of tokens for the given vesting schedule identifier.
 @return the vested amount

@notice Returns the vesting schedule information for a given identifier.
 @return the vesting schedule structure information
@dev Computes the next vesting schedule identifier for a given holder address.
@dev Returns the last vesting schedule for a given holder address.
@dev Computes the vesting schedule identifier for an address and an index.

 @return the amount of releasable tokens

@dev Returns the current time.
 @return the current timestamp in seconds.

computeNextVestingScheduleIdForHolder(ad.details: Computes the next vesting schedule identifier for a given holder address.

computeVestingScheduleIdForAddressAndInd.details: Computes the vesting schedule identifier for an address and an index.

params.dao_: address of the Bevor DAO that controls

params._auditor: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params._cliff: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest
params._duration: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest
params._start: start time of the vesting period

getLastVestingScheduleForHolder(address).details: Returns the last vesting schedule for a given holder address.

getVestingIdAtIndex(uint256).details: Returns the vesting schedule id at the given index.

getVestingSchedulesCount().details: Returns the number of vesting schedules managed by this contract.

getVestingSchedulesCountByBeneficiary(ad.details: Returns the number of vesting schedules associated to a beneficiary.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

computeReleasableAmount(bytes32).notice: Computes the vested amount of tokens for the given vesting schedule identifier.

createVestingSchedule(address,uint256,ui.notice: Creates a new vesting schedule for a beneficiary.

getVestingSchedule(bytes32).notice: Returns the vesting schedule information for a given identifier.

getVestingScheduleByAddressAndIndex(addr.notice: Returns the vesting schedule information for a given holder and index.

invalidateAudit(bytes32).notice: Revokes the vesting schedule for given identifier.
